definition: south/south side/southern part/to the south of
suffix of a noun of locality
erhua variant of 南邊|南边[nan2 bian5]

sentences.english: Thellord, the weather and almost southern Chellona.
sentences.chinese: 第三，天氣也與我國南邊差不離。

sentences.english: A little chook was flying south for the Winter.
sentences.chinese: 一隻小鳥飛到南邊去過冬。

sentences.english: Another will run two miles from Elephant and Castle in the south to Farringdon in north London.
sentences.chinese: 另一條從南邊的象堡到北倫敦的法靈頓，延伸兩英里。

sentences.english: Someone shouted as we saw a group of 42 peoplearriving from the south.
sentences.chinese: 我們看到了一列42個人的隊伍從南邊過來了。

sentences.english: Pisces is a constellation south of Andromeda.
sentences.chinese: 雙魚座位於仙女座的南邊。

sentences.english: The families of the sons of Kohath shall pitch on the side of the tabernacle southward.
sentences.chinese: 哥轄兒子的諸族要在帳幕的南邊安營。

sentences.english: The tunnel is southwest of the exit.
You can engage in croquet on the south lawn.
sentences.chinese: 你可以參加南邊草坪上的槌球遊戲。

sentences.english: or you know, if you were to go south like in the midtown or downtown.
sentences.chinese: 再或者，如果你要去南邊，比如市中心的話。

sentences.english: Xinjin country is a outer peri-urban in south Chengdou.
sentences.chinese: 新津縣是成都南邊的外圈半城市化地區。

sentences.english: These carbines were in turn given to the Viet Cong.
sentences.chinese: 這些卡賓槍再被提供給南邊的越共遊擊隊。

sentences.english: Africa lies 180 miles (289km) to the south, closer than Athens.
sentences.chinese: 非洲就在南邊180英哩處，比起跟雅典的距離更近。

sentences.english: The southern part of the axis has proved more difficult to beautify.
sentences.chinese: 中軸線的南邊部分則比較難美化。

sentences.english: South of Tecate, California, the van broke down.
sentences.chinese: 在加利福尼亞州的特卡特南邊，麪包車拋錨了。

sentences.english: A ravine delimited the property on the south.
sentences.chinese: 一條溝作爲南邊那塊地產的邊界。

sentences.english: Ceylon is an island at the south of India.
sentences.chinese: 錫蘭是印度南邊的一個島。

definition: north/north side/northern part/to the north of
east/east side/eastern part/to the east of
west/west side/western part/to the west of
Linhai county level city in Taizhou 台州[Tai1 zhou1], Zhejiang
to overlook the sea/on the waterfront
travel time/expected time for a car journey
